markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Enervating Wail](/Feats.aspx?ID=3790) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Deviant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=426" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gatewalkers Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=190) pg. 11, [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 102</row>

</column>

---

You release a terrible wail that tears at the spirits of all nearby. All living creatures in a 20-foot emanation take negative damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. The damage is 4d6, plus 1d6 for every level you have beyond 6th.
name: Enervating Wail

summary_markdown: You release a terrible wail that tears at the spirits of all nearby.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 6" pfs="Limited" > Enervating Wail Two Actions May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers Source Gatewalkers Player's Guide pg. 11, Dark Archive pg. 102 --- You release a terrible wail that tears at the spirits of all nearby. All living creatures in a 20-foot emanation take negative damage with a basic Fortitude save. The damage is 4d6, plus 1d6 for every level you have beyond 6th.
